public_instructions:
In this project you will group dresses by style.
The tutorial will introduce you to the interface and teach you how to identify similar pictures.

Interface

The main part of the task is taken up by pictures of dresses. The right side of the pictures is the color palette and instructions.
  • In training, follow the instruction on the right: it describes the key rules and the algorithm for action.
  • The palette is necessary for labeling pictures: similar dresses should be labeled with the same color.

If you can't see the panel on the right, set the page scale to 100%
(ctrl+0 for Windows or "option" + "command" + "+" for Mac OS)
